Title: Open "New Tab"
Description: Verify that Chrome is running, and confirm the operation to open a new tab by selecting "New Tab" from the menu icon.
Step:
1. Launch Chrome
2. Click the menu icon (three dots) at the top right of the screen
3. Select "New Tab" from the displayed menu
ExpectedResults: Criteria: A new tab is added to the tab bar at the top of the screen and two tabs are displayed in total

Story: Access a specified site by entering a URL
Title: Access yahoo.co.jp
Description: Launch Chrome, enter "yahoo.co.jp" into the URL bar, and verify that the website is displayed correctly.
Step:
1. Launch Chrome
2. Enter yahoo.co.jp in the URL bar and press Enter
ExpectedResults: The URL bar at the top displays "yahoo.co.jp" and the Yahoo homepage is displayed

Title: Close Chrome
Description: Verify that the running Chrome can be properly closed.

Title: Bookmark yahoo.co.jp
Description: After accessing yahoo.co.jp, verify the operation of adding a bookmark by clicking the star icon in the URL bar.
Step:
1. Confirm Chrome is running
2. Enter yahoo.co.jp in the URL bar and press Enter
3. After navigating to yahoo.co.jp, click the star icon in the URL bar
ExpectedResults: The star icon in the URL bar changes to a filled star icon

Title: Open Mobile Bookmarks
Description: Verify the operation of opening the saved "Mobile Bookmarks" folder by selecting "Bookmark" from the menu.
Step:
1. Click the menu icon (three dots) at the top right of the screen
2. Select "Bookmark" from the displayed menu
3. Select [Mobile Bookmarks]
ExpectedResults: Yahoo! JAPAN is displayed on the Mobile Bookmarks screen

Story: Change the name of an existing bookmark
Title: Rename the "Yahoo! JAPAN" bookmark to "Changed Yahoo"
Description: Verify the operation of editing the existing "Yahoo! JAPAN" bookmark and changing its name to "Changed Yahoo".
Step:
1. Click the bookmark options menu icon (three dots) to the right of [Yahoo! JAPAN]
2. Select [Edit] from the menu
3. Enter "Changed Yahoo" in the [Name] field of the [Edit bookmark] dialog and confirm
4. Click the back icon (left arrow) at the top left of the [Edit bookmark] dialog
ExpectedResults: Changed Yahoo is displayed on the Mobile Bookmarks screen
